name: Executive Summary
description: Structured summary block placed immediately after the cover page, presenting key metrics, 3-5 bullet findings, and optional methodology note in a visually distinct g10-themed container.

grid.margins: $spacing-07 (32px) internal padding, $spacing-09 (48px) top margin from cover

components: Key metrics row: 2-3 inline stat callouts using $heading-02 + $label-01 caption
Findings list: 3-5 bullet points using $body-long-01, each one sentence max
Methodology note: $label-02 in $text-03, bottom-aligned as footnote-style
rules: Always use g10 (light gray) theme to visually separate from surrounding white-theme content
Section heading uses $heading-04 — not larger, to avoid competing with the cover title
Findings list must contain 3-5 items; fewer than 3 looks sparse, more than 5 loses focus
Each finding is exactly one sentence — no multi-sentence bullets
Key metrics use $heading-02 for the number and $label-01 for the descriptor below it
Internal padding is $spacing-07 (32px) on all sides for comfortable reading
Place immediately after cover page — never deeper than page 2
Methodology note (if present) uses $label-02 in $text-03 color, separated by $spacing-05 from findings
antiPatterns: Never place executive summary deeper than page 2 — it must follow the cover immediately
Never include charts or data tables in the executive summary — use prose and inline metrics only
Never exceed 5 bullet findings — distill to the most critical insights
Never use full-width (colSpan 16) — the offset provides essential visual hierarchy and breathing room
Never omit the g10 theme — the summary must be visually distinct from surrounding content
